user_query: hates me man tom came over to me at this they want to make an impression didn't he i want to know that you've met him robert you weren't even performing that night we could have spent time together the truth is dad there are lots of things that we don't tell you i didn't always tell you everything don't blame your mother for this rosie the baby is yours isn't it i was going to tell you she doesn't know if she likes boys or girl robert did your mother know you were pregnant why would she do that i didn't want to disappoint you david do you still live in new york at that apartment no tell me where i can find you when i can see you tell me the truth wipe that smirk off your face after everything i've done for you this is all you can do is laugh your mother always asked me why i was so hard on you this is why have some respect what do i tell your mother what do i say i'm out of here tell her nothing we'll tell her what she wants to hear tell her that we are all fine [Music] finally have my family in the same room was the heart attack not sure don't lie to me come on and it was a heart attack and mild one good start at least i know david is in trouble so who who's gonna tell me what is it just tell me the truth dad i'm sorry david died dude no that's not true no we knew that he was traveling and calls from mexico he's been having a tough time since mom died yeah but it was mexico or it could be anyone it could be a mistake i flew out there after you visited no you're going to be

entities.entity_description: Tom은 Robert에게 다가와 인상을 남기려 했던 인물이다
Robert는 공연을 하지 않았던 밤에 언급되는 인물로, 어머니가 임신 사실을 알았는지 질문받는다
Rosie는 아기와 관련된 인물로, 남자를 좋아하는지 여자를 좋아하는지 모른다고 언급된다
David는 뉴욕 아파트에 살았던 인물로, 어머니 사망 후 힘든 시간을 보내다가 멕시코에서 사망한 것으로 밝혀진다
Dad는 가족의 아버지로, 심장마비를 겪었으며 자녀들에게 진실을 요구하고 David의 죽음을 알게 된다
Mother는 이미 사망한 가족의 어머니로, 아버지가 왜 자녀들에게 엄격했는지 물어봤던 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Tom은 Robert에게 다가와 인상을 남기려 했다
Robert의 어머니가 그의 임신 사실을 알았는지에 대한 질문이 있다
Dad는 David의 아버지이며, David의 죽음 소식을 듣게 된다
Dad와 Mother는 부부 관계이며, Mother는 이미 사망했다
David는 어머니의 죽음 이후 힘든 시간을 보냈다
Rosie는 Dad의 가족 구성원으로, 아기와 관련된 비밀이 있다
